statements: SELECT id, first_name, last_name FROM marketing_info;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM marketing_info;
SELECT company_name, job_title FROM marketing_info;
SELECT * FROM marketing_info WHERE id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, company_name FROM marketing_info WHERE id = 2;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM marketing_info WHERE company_name = 'ABC Company';
SELECT * FROM marketing_info WHERE job_title = 'Manager';
SELECT id, first_name, email FROM marketing_info WHERE company_name = 'XYZ Corp';
SELECT * FROM marketing_info WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT id, last_name, email FROM marketing_info WHERE job_title = 'CEO';
SELECT * FROM marketing_info WHERE company_name = 'Tech Solutions' AND job_title = 'Engineer';
SELECT id, first_name, company_name FROM marketing_info WHERE job_title = 'Director';
SELECT * FROM marketing_info WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT id, first_name, job_title FROM marketing_info WHERE company_name = 'Marketing Group';
SELECT * FROM marketing_info WHERE first_name = 'Jane' AND last_name = 'Smith' AND company_name = 'Tech Solutions';
SELECT id, last_name, phone_number FROM marketing_info WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM marketing_info WHERE phone_number = '1234567890';
SELECT id, first_name, job_title FROM marketing_info WHERE email = 'jane.smith@example.com';
SELECT * FROM marketing_info WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp' AND job_title = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM marketing_info WHERE first_name = 'Alice' OR last_name = 'Brown';
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 10
SELECT id, name FROM customers WHERE id > 5
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 2
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 10
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Doe'
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM customers
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT name FROM customers
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1 OR id = 3
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name IN ('Alice', 'Bob')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%Doe%'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 2 AND phone_number LIKE '%123%'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '_555%'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id % 2 = 0
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6)
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id > 15
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '123%555'
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, subscription_status FROM customers WHERE subscription_status = true;
SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_source, lead_status FROM leads WHERE date_created >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT lead_id, lead_name FROM leads WHERE lead_status = 'qualified';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, SUM(budget) AS total_budget FROM marketing_campaigns GROUP BY campaign_name ORDER BY total_budget DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customers;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_leads FROM leads;
SELECT AVG(budget) AS average_budget FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT lead_name, lead_source FROM leads WHERE date_created BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT DISTINCT lead_status FROM leads;
SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(*) AS total_leads FROM marketing_campaigns JOIN leads ON marketing_campaigns.campaign_id = leads.lead_id GROUP BY campaign_name;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%summer%';
SELECT campaign_name, SUM(budget) AS total_budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 500 GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING total_budget > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM CampaignMetrics;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks FROM CampaignMetrics WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT metric_id, impressions, conversions FROM CampaignMetrics WHERE impressions > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Audiences;
SELECT audience_id, audience_name FROM Audiences;
SELECT * FROM CampaignAudiences;
SELECT campaign_id, audience_id FROM CampaignAudiences WHERE audience_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns JOIN CampaignMetrics ON Campaigns.campaign_id = CampaignMetrics.campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_name, impressions, spend FROM Campaigns JOIN CampaignMetrics ON Campaigns.campaign_id = CampaignMetrics.campaign_id WHERE spend > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns JOIN CampaignAudiences ON Campaigns.campaign_id = CampaignAudiences.campaign_id JOIN Audiences ON CampaignAudiences.audience_id = Audiences.audience_id;

SELECT campaign_name, audience_name FROM Campaigns JOIN CampaignAudiences ON Campaigns.campaign_id = CampaignAudiences.campaign_id JOIN Audiences ON CampaignAudiences.audience_id = Audiences.audience_id;
SELECT * FROM CampaignMetrics JOIN Audiences ON CampaignMetrics.clicks < 50 AND Audiences.audience_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CampaignMetrics WHERE spend BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT * FROM Audiences WHERE description LIKE '%target%';
SELECT * FROM CampaignAudiences WHERE audience_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM ads;
SELECT id, campaign_id FROM ads WHERE id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT id, campaign_name FROM campaigns WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT customer_id, ad_id FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT id, ad_content FROM ads WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date <= '2022-01-01' AND end_date >= '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 10 AND interaction_type = 'view';
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM ads WHERE campaign_id IS NULL;
SELECT id, campaign_id FROM ads WHERE campaign_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY end_date;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS interactions_count FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
